title: Covid: Germany puts major restrictions on unvaccinated
content:
1. Covid: Germany puts major restrictions on unvaccinated  BBC News
  2. Germany locks down unvaccinated people, as leaders plan to make shots compulsory  CNN
  3. Germany Announces Restrictions on Unvaccinated People  The New York Times
  4. Germany backs new COVID rules for unvaccinated; parliament will consider vaccine mandate  USA TODAY
  5. Germany announces nationwide lockdown for the unvaccinated  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
